description:
We bring together people interested in Product, Design and Tech. A place for the hybrids, the unicorns, the misfits, the ones who strive for a higher purpose and want to feel at home. We want to hear about your experience and share with you our knowledge. We are not sure about the format, but one thing we know for sure, we will meet regularly to debate ideas and foster collaboration. 
Agenda 
19:00 – Meet & Greet
19:15 – Introduction
19:30 – Product Design 101 with Pedro Gonçalves, Digital Product Designer at Farfetch
20:00 – Drinks & Networking
20:15 – Discussion Panel with Pedro Gonçalves {Farfetch}, Catarina Garcia {Mudo Podcast}, Sónia Gomes, moderated by Isabel Machado {Prozis}.
20:45 – Wrap-up
name: Product Design 101
